name: Wise Mystical Tree (солнышко)
description:
Mistery Tree, are you like that? Wise and magic oak travel into the forest.

An unusual game about the meme of 2022. Make wise decisions by imitating a mysterious oak tree. The full story, immersed in the mysterious atmospheric world of Old Oak.

You have to face the dangers of the forest! Are you ready, giant nut lovers? Please go ahead!

The mysterious oak stands alone on the edge of the forest, like a real Centennial Forest Oak Shield! Distribute resources in a unique way — balance, otherwise you will fall like an arid stump. A real world of secrets and riddles — where are you?

As the defender of the forest, a terrifying mountain of wood, you are the mighty king of the forest — a true giant, the bearer of the ancestral bark.

Replenish your long mana and keep an eye on the health of the Great Magic Oak Giant. Your twigs are your tool — use it! Pacify the inhabitants of the forest and make them allies in the game Mysterious BigWood.
